text: Dangshan yiban de botao longzhaozhe tamen shi, tamen jiu qiancheng jingyi di qiqiu an la. Dan dang ta shi tamen ping'an denglu shi, tamen zhong youxie ren jiu caiqu zhe zhong zhidao [jie yu xinyang yu bu xinyang zhi jian]. Wei mei ge beixinqiyi zhe he wang'enfuyi zhe cai hui fouren wo de jixiang.
